sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均可表示人的"能力，才能"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: ability, capacity, capability, genius, talent, competence, faculty, gift, aptitude
means: ability ：普通用词，指人先天的或学来的各种能力。
capacity ：侧重指人的潜在能力，通常不指体力，多指才智，尤指接受与领悟能力。
capability ：多用于人，指胜任某项具体工作的能力，也指本身具有、尚未发挥的潜在能力。常与of或for连用。
genius ：语气最强，指天赋的高度才能与智力。
talent ：着重指人某方面具有可发展和培养的突出天赋才能，但语意比genius弱。
competence ：正式用词，侧重指令人满意的业务能力与水平，达到胜任某项工作等的要求。
gift ：着重个人的天赋的才能或在某方面的显著本领，常暗含不能用一般规律作解释的意味。
aptitude ：多指先天或后天习得的运用自如的能力，常暗示接受能力强，能迅速掌握一种学术训练或艺术技巧。

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能力;本领;才能,才干;专门技能,天资
stems_affixes.word_buile: abili能力+ty表名词→n.能力;本领;才能,才干;专门技能,天资
de去掉+bility=ability[n.能力;本领;才能,才干;专门技能,天资]→n.衰弱,虚弱
de去掉+bili=abili能力+tate=ate表动词→去掉能力→使衰弱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 提供周转资金, 予以穿着
stems_affixes.word_buile: h可看作是have+abili能力+tate=ate表动词→有什么能力→使具备能力
re重新+habilitate具备能力→v.修复,恢复[职位等]

entry.def: Your ability to do something is the fact that you can do it.

example.ex: The public never had faith in his ability to handle the job...
example.tran: 公众从来不相信他有能力胜任这一职位。

example.ex: He has the ability to bring out the best in others.

entry.def: Your ability is the quality or skill that you have which makes it possible for you to do something.

example.ex: Her drama teacher spotted her ability...
example.tran: 她的戏剧老师发现了她的才能。

example.ex: I have confidence in the ability of the players...
example.tran: 我对于球员们的能力充满信心。

entry.def: If you do something to the best of your abilities or to the best of your ability, you do it as well as you can.

example.ex: I take care of them to the best of my abilities...
example.tran: 我尽我所能地照顾他们。

example.ex: They tackled them to the best of their ability.
example.tran: 他们竭尽全力给予解决。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment
2. possession of the qualities (especially mental qualities) required to do something or get something done;

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French ablete, from Latin habilitas, from habilis 'able'

sentences.cn: 我尽全力做好我的工作。
sentences.en: I try to do my job to the best of my ability (= as well as I can) .

sentences.cn: 为了防止过于重视忙碌的工作状态，《深度工作：在充满干扰的世界里专注成功的守则》一书的作者卡尔·纽波特建议养成“深度工作”的习惯，即一种摒除干扰、集中注意力的能力。
sentences.en: To combat the trap of putting a premium on being busy, Cal Newport, author of Deep work: Rules for Focused Success in a Distracted world, recommends building a habit of "deep work"—the ability to focus without distraction.

sentences.cn: 不过就像美国许多大学老师那样，对于能否通过某个“学习 (30) 成果”——如毕业生的调查推理能力——来衡量他们的教育工作，普渡大学的教员们仍持 (29) 怀疑态度。
